actions.name: Hydro Circuit
actions.description: Effect: The user's Physical- and Special-Category Electric-Type attacks deal 30% more damage to targets that are Swimming, or in Rainy Weather. The user's Physical- and Special-Category Water-Type attacks have a 10% chance to inflict @Affliction[paralysis] 5.

system.description: Effect: The user's Physical- and Special-Category Electric-Type attacks deal 30% more damage to targets that are Swimming, or in Rainy Weather. The user's Physical- and Special-Category Water-Type attacks have a 10% chance to inflict @Affliction[paralysis] 5.
